lead_paragraph: Ghosts take the Bowen family's youngest daughter from their house, which was built on an ancient holy site, and the family must fight to bring her back with the help of an accomplished researcher of the paranormal.
snippet: Ghosts take the Bowen family's youngest daughter from their house, which was built on an ancient holy site, and the family must fight to bring her back with the help of an accomplished researcher of the paranormal.
